title: Alan Dershowitz: "Taking The Stand"
description: Michael welcomed Harvard Law Professor Alan Dershowitz into the SiriusXM Studios to talk about his memoir, "Taking the Stand: My Life in the Law." Original air date 27 November 2013. The book was published on 15 October 2013.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Alan Dershowitz)
